oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Newton Project
The Newton Manuscript Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Iliffe, Rob
Young, John
Hawkins, Michael
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: text_and_corpus_linguistics
Physics--Religious aspects
Physics--Bibliography
Physics literature
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The resource consists of a number of different pages or files giving information on Newton's life and work and also on the development of the Newton Project. There is also detailed information relating to editorial principles and technical issues relating to the web site. The central focus of the resource is the series of XML encoded transcriptions of Newton's theological works, personal notebooks, all draft biographical information about Newton dating from the eighteenth century, and also many of his early scientific papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Oxford Text Archive, University of Oxford
